title: Replace broken share-card download with screenshot/share instructions and improve reaction-time emphasis on share card

requirements.text: Remove the non-working share-card save/download behavior and replace it with an on-screen instruction on the Share Preview screen that tells the user to take a screenshot and share it on social media when native sharing is not available.

quotes: Ukládací začít co. stále nefunguje. Ale nepotřebujeme ho. Můžem ho nahradit nápisem, výzvou aby si udělali screenshot a sdíleli na sociálních sítích.

acceptanceCriteria: On the Share Preview screen, there is a clearly visible instruction in English telling users to take a screenshot and share it on social media (e.g., "If Share doesn’t work, take a screenshot and share it on social media.").
Tapping the Share button no longer triggers an automatic file download as a fallback (no "Image downloaded!" toast).
If Web Share (with files) is unsupported or fails, the UI provides the screenshot instruction rather than attempting to download.

requirements.text: Update the Share Preview card layout so the reaction time value is larger and uses a more prominent, higher-contrast color than the surrounding sentence text, while keeping the existing exact sentence: “your reaction time to Boo is <XY>ms. Excellent!”

quotes: Možná bych na sdílecí kartě zvětšil cislo Času reakční doby. A možná mu dali jinou, výraznější barvu.

acceptanceCriteria: On the Share Preview card, the reaction time number is visually emphasized (larger font size than the surrounding text).
The reaction time number uses a more prominent color (e.g., accent/primary) than the surrounding sentence text, improving readability on the existing winter-glass background.
The user-facing sentence remains exactly: "your reaction time to Boo is <XY>ms. Excellent!" (with <XY> replaced by the measured reaction time in milliseconds).

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not add backend logic; keep the backend as-is (single Motoko actor remains empty).
Use English for any new user-facing text.
nonGoals: Do not add or reintroduce a dedicated Download button on the Share Preview screen.
Do not change the existing game flow/state machine beyond what is needed for the share preview messaging and styling.
Do not implement any external/social-media API integrations.
